choiceresponse.label: You're ready to become an Open edX Contributor! You've learned lots of ways to contribute already, and we hope you'll take part in them! Here's some ideas we've covered throughout the course:

checkboxgroup.choice: Introduce yourself on the forums, in the Introductions category
Read through the list of active Working Groups
Attend a working group meeting as a guest!
Pick up some work from the working group of your liking and start interacting with other contributors
Or try solving bugs reported on our community channels!
